detailsData.title: Client-Centered Approach
detailsData.content: Every client receives individual consideration through our confidential intake process. We offer a safe, confidential, and thorough consultation and discussion regarding legal rights and options.

detailsData.title: Comprehensive Services
detailsData.content: From representation on big litigation matters to advice on ongoing employment and job transition issues, our lawyers provide strategies and solutions for all employment needs.

address: 221 North Main St., Suite 300 Ann Arbor, MI 48104
valueProp: Blanchard & Walker represents and advises clients in all matters of employment law, business policies, and compensation advice. Our team of Michigan based lawyers fight for the rights of clients in EEOC actions, disciplinary review proceedings, and employment related lawsuits, including discrimination, retaliation, and whistleblower litigation. Employees come to Blanchard & Walker for representation and legal advice on all matters of wrongful discharge, discrimination, or retaliation. Blanchard & Walker lawyers are industry leaders on accommodations and medical leave issues, wage violations, and whistleblower law.
